venue.address_1: The Fenway Victory Gardens at the intersection of the Emerald Necklace and Path B
venue.name: The Fenway Victory Gardens at the intersection of the Emerald Necklace and Path B

item.description:
Join us as we meander through Americaâ€™s oldest continuously operating World War II Victory Gardens, which comprise more than 500 private eclectic gardens spread across seven acres. Established in 1942, these gardens were originally laid out to ease the demand on wartime food supply. Now they provide a unique and vibrant community space within the Emerald Necklace.

Registration is recommended.
item.name: COMMON BOSTON - Fenway Victory Gardens Tour
